title: Strengthening App Development Practical Competencies: Problem-Solving Modeling Through Data-Driven Collaborative Programming

context.prior_knowledge: Basic programming syntax comprehension and logical reasoning skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design programming models to solve problems by analyzing real-world data.
Learners can collaborate with peers to share and provide feedback on data-driven problem-solving processes.
Learners can reduce gaps in the modeling phase by utilizing personalized learning strategies that consider gender-specific characteristics.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
